# Kubernetes配置管理

# Secret
Secret的主要作用就是加密数据，然后存在etcd里面，让Pod容器以挂载Volume方式进行访问

- 以变量的方式挂载
```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: certificate
  namespace: test
  selfLink: /api/v1/namespaces/test/secrets/certificate
  uid: b6d284d9-0135-11ea-a4d6-26fbc5b0a001
  resourceVersion: '3242571649'
  creationTimestamp: '2019-11-07T08:08:00Z'
  annotations:
    field.cattle.io/projectId: 'c-gq4g2:p-kx45v'
    kubectl.kubernetes.io/last-applied-configuration: >
      {"apiVersion":"v1","data":{"tls.crt":"","tls.key":""},"kind":"Secret","metadata":{"annotations":{},"creationTimestamp":null,"name":"certificate","namespace":"test"},"type":"kubernetes.io/tls"}

#保存的证书的数据
data:  
  tls.crt: >-
    
  tls.key: >-
    
type: kubernetes.io/tls


```
- Volume数据卷形式挂载
......


# ConfigMap
- ConfigMap作用是存储不加密的数据到etcd中，让Pod以变量或数据卷Volume挂载到容器中
应用场景：配置文件

## 以变量的形式挂载Pod
```
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: v2master-chenyunbin-conf-env
  namespace: test

data:  
  special.level: info
  special.type: hello
```

- 1 创建pod
```
kubectl apply -f myconfig.yaml
```
- 2 获取
```
kubectl get cm
```

- 3 然后我们创建完该pod后，我们就需要在创建一个 config-var.yaml 来使用我们的配置信息

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: v2master-chenyunbin-57c74bf44b-nsnfv
spec:
  containers:
     - name: php  
       image: 'registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/yifangyun-library/php-centos6:7.1.33'
       command: ["bin/bash" , "-c","echo ${LEVEL} ${TYPE} "]  ## 打印变量信息
       env:
         - name: LEVEL
            valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:        
                name: myconfig    ## 挂载配置文件
                key: special.level
         - name: LEVEL
            valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:        
                name: myconfig
                key: special.type
```

- 4 最后我们查看输出
  
  kubectl logs mypod




## Volume数据卷形式挂载
- 看chenyunbin pod中的配置


```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
    name: v2master-chenyunbin-57c74bf44b-nsnfv
    image: 'registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/yifangyun-library/php-centos6:7.1.33'
    ## 这里可以修改一下pod启动的命令，比如输出一些东西 pod的yaml配置老验证配置的正确性
    command: ["bin/bash" , "-c","cat pod.yaml "]  
...
...


## Volume数据卷形式挂载
spec:
  volumes:
    - name: application-config-volume
      configMap:
        name: application-config
        defaultMode: 420
    ## 这个是Volume数据卷形式挂载
    - name: personal-v2-application-config-volume 
      configMap:
        ## 配置configMap文件的名字
        name: v2master-chenyunbin-application-config   
        defaultMode: 420
    - name: personal-v2-conf-env-volume
      configMap:
        name: v2master-chenyunbin-conf-env
        defaultMode: 420
    - name: fetch-properties-volume
      configMap:
        name: v2-fetch-properties-config
        defaultMode: 420
    - name: personal-nginx-config
      configMap:
        name: v2master-chenyunbin-nginx-config
        defaultMode: 420
    - name: php-config
      configMap:
        name: v2-php-config
        defaultMode: 420
    - name: certificate
      secret:
        secretName: certificate
        defaultMode: 420
    - name: fangcloud-cn-certificate
      secret:
        secretName: fangcloud-cn-certificate
        defaultMode: 420

```
## 配置了存储卷的位置
```
        
          volumeMounts:
            - name: application-config-volume
              mountPath: /opt/properties
            - name: personal-v2-application-config-volume
              mountPath: /opt/v2-application-config
            - name: personal-v2-conf-env-volume
              mountPath: /opt/v2-conf-env
            - name: fetch-properties-volume
              mountPath: /tmp/v2-fetch-properties
            - name: personal-persistent-volume
              mountPath: /var/www/html/site
              subPath: v2master/
            - name: default-token-whkxf
              readOnly: true
              mountPath: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount
```
